# isIncrementalSearchingEnabled

**Instance Property**

Determines if incremental searching is enabled.

## Declaration

```swift
var isIncrementalSearchingEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], then the find bar will do incremental searches. If it returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], then the find bar will behave regularly.

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Incremental Search Configuration

- **drawIncrementalMatchHighlight(in:)**: Override this method to draw custom highlighting.
- **incrementalMatchRanges**: Array of incremental search matches posted on the main queue, which have been found during a background search.
- **incrementalSearchingShouldDimContentView**: Determines the type of incremental search feedback to be presented
